title: Changing the directory where e-mail messages are stored
content:
Hi, I just installed Thunderbird on Fedora Linux and I tried to change the default directory where Thunderbird stores e-mail boxes for each e-mail account.

I managed to do the change, however the directory absolute path which is shown in the local directory field is different from what I just changed, even though the change has been successful and I can see the content of my inbox. For example the shown path is 

                             "/run/flatpak/doc/lad91b03/mailserver-name.org"

(this absolute path doesn't exist) and the real path is something like: 

                         /home/username/Documents/Mail/AppData/Roaming/Profiles/...../mailserver-name.org"

This doesn't happen on Windows...
creator: sinergy

title: Thunderbird 128.v. - Failed To Send Out Digital Signed Emails - Error Message Shows Signing Certificate Not Found
content:
Hello,

I have been using Thunderbird 091 and 102 version to send out digital signed Emails with the help of a pki usb token. Lately, I have downloaded the newer version 128 and to perform the same task by using the same token with the same certificates in, however it failed to do so by showing up an error message when I tried to send out the digital signed Emails. The error message indicates that the signing certificate can't be found or expired, but nothing has been changed except for the newer version of the thunderbird.

Please let me know how can I fix the issue.

Thank you!
creator: lois12

title: Connecting to a Gmail account in Thunderbird
content:
I've been using Thunderbird to handle my email accounts for a long time (years). My Gmail connection was misbehaving, so I deleted the account on Thunderbird, verified that everything was still there by using the google.com/gmail interface (which works fine), then tried to recreate (reconnect) the Gmail account in Thunderbird. Followed the routine "Set Up Another Account", "Email", entered a name, gmail address, and password, then "Continue". Thunderbird looks up a configuration, finds Gmail, and it all looks normal. Checking in "Configure manually", OAuth2 is there. Click "Done", and it begins "Checking password", and never comes back.........

I know the Gmail account and password are valid, because I can get mail directly from Google.....

I'm at a loss...any suggestions would be appreciated.
creator: Richard.Ripley

title: Multiple folders created inbox-0,inbox-1 etc. after Thunderbird update and blank inbox creen after deleting email
content:
Mám stejný problém jako lidé tady. Neřešil někdo? https://www.reddit.com/r/Thunderbird/comments/1foy7av/problem_thunderbird_creates_inbox1_2_3_folders/

Dokonce jsem přeinstaloval Thunderbird a vytvořil nový profil a za pár dní se otci problém objevil znovu. Úplně odstraňovat ho nechci, mají tam i profily ostatní členové rodiny. Ve zkratce: Po smazání "zmizí" pole s doručenou poštou a musím restartovat Thunderbird. Zároveň se vytvoří složka inbox-0,inbox-1 atd.

Poštu používá seznam.cz s POP3, takže naprosto standartní nastavení.

title: affichage du nombre de messages à télécharger
content: Depuis quelques jours, lorsque je demande de relever les messages (car je n'ai pas paramétré thunderbird pour qu'il le fasse automatiquement à l'ouverture) s'affiche en bas de page un message du genre "téléchargement de 6 messages" par exemple puis "chargement du message x sur 6" par exemple (avec x = 1 puis 2 ...). Or, la plupart du temps, il y a bien moins de messages qui sont à télécharger. Il me semble cependant que le nombre de messages qui sont téléchargés est correct (je dis cela en ayant examiné ma boite aux lettres chez le fournisseur d'accès à Internet). Cette situation m'inquiète à chaque fois : ce qui est annoncé n'est pas ce qui se réalise ! Y aurait-il un réglage à effectuer dans les paramètres ? Merci pour l'attention portée à ma demande

title: Kép betöltés blokkolása egy email szerkesztés közben
content: T. Thuinderbird, Amikor egy emailt szerkesztek, akkor használok egy kiterjesztést az aláírásom beillesztésére: Signature Switch. Maga a kiterjesztés kiválóan működik, ugyanakkor minden alkalommal megjelenik egy sárga üzenet, miszerint a Thunderbird blokkolta az aláírásban lévő kép beillesztését az emailbe. A beállításokban be van kattintva a távoli tartalom engedélyezése, bár az a távoli tartalomról szól nem a helyiről. Az aláírás html-ben img src="file:///... hivatkozás van, ami a lokális gépre mutat. Az email szerkesztésekor a blokkolást feloldva a kép tökéletesen bekerül. Vajon van-e valamilyen megoldás, hogy ne kelljen minden alkalommal külön feloldani a blokkolást? Köszönöm Vilmos
creator: vilmos1

title: Não exibe tabelas no corpo do e-mail, somente seu conteúdo.
content:
Bom dia,

Recebi e-mail de uma tabela copiado do excel, mas não mostra a estrutura da tabela ao chegar para meu e-mail configurado no thunderbird, só aparece o conteúdo todo desconfigurado. Configurei a conta no MS Outlook e a mensagem é exibida normalmente com a tabela e seu conteúdo.

Gostaria de saber se é alguma configuração que precisa ser realizada.

Utilizo o Thunderbird versão 128.5.0esr (64 bits). Já uso como gerenciado do meu e-mail a mais de 10 anos, primeira vez que isso ocorre comigo.

Obs.: Antes do mês de Outubro/2024 estava normal, percebi que depois desse período que iniciou esse erro.

title: Migrate emails
content: We have had our sympatico.ca account for decades, but have recently created a gmail address as we will probably leave Bell, for a number of reasons, and I understand that we will then lose all remaining sympatico emails. We recently switched from Outlook to Thunderbird, but my guess is that we will no longer need Thunderbird, and gmail will be easily transportable, though it has some rather distasteful features, limited storage being one. My question is, is there a way to migrate the emails away from Bell and retain them. This doesn't seem to be a strictly Thunderbird question, though I'm sure it has arisen numerous times in the past. Thanks.

title: App Mobile Thunderbird
content:
Salve a tutti Oggi ho installato l'app mobile di Thunderbird (che attendevo da tempo). Configurata in pochi istanti essendo già un utente Thunderbird da pc fisso e devo dire che le prime impressioni sono molto positive.

Mi lascia perplesso solo una cosa e cioè che se non apro l'applicazione non mi avvisa di nuovi messaggi e questo è molto male. Secondo me dovrebbe comportarsi come le altre applicazioni che all'arrivo della posta sul server avvisa con una notifica

Qualcuno che utilizza l'applicazione mobile e che ha riscontrato il mio stesso problema? E qualora lo avesse riscontrato e risolto potrebbe gentilmente condividere la soluzione?

Grazie
